verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> this <WH2088> word, <WH1697> ye kine <WH6510> of Bashan, <WH1316> that <WH834> are in the mountain <WH2022> of Samaria, <WH8111> which oppress <WH6231> the poor, <WH1800> which crush <WH7533> the needy, <WH34> which say <WH559> to their masters, <WH113> Bring, <WH935> and let us drink. <WH8354>

The Lord <WH136> GOD <WH3069> hath sworn <WH7650> by his holiness, <WH6944> that, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> the days <WH3117> shall come <WH935> upon <WH5921> you, that he will take you away <WH5375> <WH853> with hooks, <WH6793> and your posterity <WH319> with fishhooks. <WH5518> <WH1729>

And ye shall go out <WH3318> at the breaches, <WH6556> every <WH802> cow at that which is before <WH5048> her; and ye shall cast <WH7993> them into the palace, <WH2038> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Come <WH935> to Bethel, <WH1008> and transgress; <WH6586> at Gilgal <WH1537> multiply <WH7235> transgression; <WH6586> and bring <WH935> your sacrifices <WH2077> every morning, <WH1242> and your tithes <WH4643> after three <WH7969> years: <WH3117>

And offer a sacrifice <WH6999> of thanksgiving <WH8426> with <WH4480> leaven, <WH2557> and proclaim <WH7121> and publish <WH8085> the free offerings: <WH5071> for <WH3588> this <WH3651> liketh <WH157> you, O ye children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

And I <WH589> also <WH1571> have given <WH5414> you cleanness <WH5356> of teeth <WH8127> in all <WH3605> your cities, <WH5892> and want <WH2640> of bread <WH3899> in all <WH3605> your places: <WH4725> yet have ye not <WH3808> returned <WH7725> unto <WH5704> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

And also <WH1571> I <WH595> have withheld <WH4513> <WH853> the rain <WH1653> from <WH4480> you, when there were yet <WH5750> three <WH7969> months <WH2320> to the harvest: <WH7105> and I caused it to rain <WH4305> upon <WH5921> one <WH259> city, <WH5892> and caused it not to rain <WH4305> <WH3808> upon <WH5921> another <WH259> city: <WH5892> one <WH259> piece <WH2513> was rained upon, <WH4305> and the piece <WH2513> whereupon <WH834> <WH5921> it rained <WH4305> not <WH3808> withered. <WH3001>

So two <WH8147> or three <WH7969> cities <WH5892> wandered <WH5128> unto <WH413> one <WH259> city, <WH5892> to drink <WH8354> water; <WH4325> but they were not <WH3808> satisfied: <WH7646> yet have ye not <WH3808> returned <WH7725> unto <WH5704> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

I have smitten <WH5221> you with blasting <WH7711> and mildew: <WH3420> when your gardens <WH1593> and your vineyards <WH3754> and your fig trees <WH8384> and your olive trees <WH2132> increased, <WH7235> the palmerworm <WH1501> devoured <WH398> them: yet have ye not <WH3808> returned <WH7725> unto <WH5704> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

I have sent <WH7971> among you the pestilence <WH1698> after the manner <WH1870> of Egypt: <WH4714> your young men <WH970> have I slain <WH2026> with the sword, <WH2719> and have taken away <WH5973> <WH7628> your horses; <WH5483> and I have made the stink <WH889> of your camps <WH4264> to come up <WH5927> unto your nostrils: <WH639> yet have ye not <WH3808> returned <WH7725> unto <WH5704> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

I have overthrown <WH2015> some of you, as God <WH430> overthrew <WH4114> <WH853> Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> and ye were <WH1961> as a firebrand <WH181> plucked <WH5337> out of the burning: <WH4480> <WH8316> yet have ye not <WH3808> returned <WH7725> unto <WH5704> me, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> will I do <WH6213> unto thee, O Israel: <WH3478> and because <WH6118> <WH3588> I will do <WH6213> this <WH2063> unto thee, prepare <WH3559> to meet <WH7125> thy God, <WH430> O Israel. <WH3478>

For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> he that formeth <WH3335> the mountains, <WH2022> and createth <WH1254> the wind, <WH7307> and declareth <WH5046> unto man <WH120> what <WH4100> is his thought, <WH7808> that maketh <WH6213> the morning <WH7837> darkness, <WH5890> and treadeth <WH1869> upon <WH5921> the high places <WH1116> of the earth, <WH776> The LORD, <WH3068> The God <WH430> of hosts, <WH6635> is his name. <WH8034>
